root.name: Hoyle Official Book of Games: Volume 1
root.description: Play one of six different games in the card games collection:Crazy EightsOld MaidHeartsGin RummyCribbageKlondike SolitairePlayers can face off against classic Sierra characters of the era, such as Sonny Bonds, Leisure Suit Larry Laffer, Roger Wilco or King Graham.Inexplicably, Sonny Bonds bears no resemblance to the character found in any of his appearances in Police Quest; instead, he bears a striking resemblance to Police Quest creator Jim Walls.
